{{Infobox Pokéball |name = Fast Ball |image = [[File:Fast Ball.png]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Fast Ball''. |price = Variable |catchTime = 0.5s |catchRate = 0% |location =
*[[Fast Ball#Shops|Shops]] *[[Fast Ball#Dungeons|Dungeons]] }} ==Description== The '''Fast Ball''' is a type of [[Poké Balls|Poké Ball]]. It automatically tries to catch a wild Pokémon after defeating it if is the highest type of Poké Ball active and there is a remaining supply in the Poké Ball selector. ==Details== A specialized Poké Ball to capture Pokémon with, it provides no increased catch chance rate and catches Pokémon in 0.5s. == Acquisition == ===Shops=== {{ItemPrice/head‎|Pokéballs}} {{ItemPrice|[[Berry Master#Trades|Goldenrod City]]|20 - 40 Random [[File:Cheri.png|25px]] [[Berries#Gen 1 Berries|Gen 1 Berries]]
5 - 15 Random [[File:Persim.png|25px]] [[Berries#Gen 2 Berries|Gen 2 Berries]]}} |} |} ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Pokéballs}} {{LootItem|Poké Ball Factory|Epic}} |} |}
{{Pokéballs}}
